content.query:
USE [CovidonDemand];
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'DimDate') 
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[DimDate]
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'DimGeo') 
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[DimGeo]
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'FactCovid') 
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[FactCovid]
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'FactPopulation') 
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[FactPopulation]
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[DimDate] WITH (
        LOCATION = 'Gold/Dim/Date/',
        DATA_SOURCE = [CovidData],
        FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFF]
) 

AS

SELECT
    DISTINCT
    [daterep], [day], [month], [year]
FROM
    [dbo].[CovidDataParquet]

Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[DimGeo] WITH (
        LOCATION = 'Gold/Dim/Geo/',
        DATA_SOURCE = [CovidData],
        FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFF]
) 

AS

SELECT 
    DISTINCT
    [geoid],[countriesandterritories],[countryterritorycode],[continentexp]
FROM
    [dbo].[CovidDataParquet]

Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[FactPopulation] WITH (
        LOCATION = 'Gold/Fact/Population/',
        DATA_SOURCE = [CovidData],
        FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFF]
) 

AS

SELECT 
    DISTINCT
    [geoid],[popdata2018]
FROM
    [dbo].[CovidDataParquet]

Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[FactCovid] WITH (
        LOCATION = 'Gold/Fact/Covid/',
        DATA_SOURCE = [CovidData],
        FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFF]
) 

AS

SELECT 
    DISTINCT
    [daterep],[geoid], [cases], [deaths]
FROM
    [dbo].[CovidDataParquet]

Go
